archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.2.4c: c) map appropriate rights or privileges to users or other entities at different granularities (e.g. all corporate networks, target systems, or specific data fields)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
